Posts.Content:
thanks Tailia, i need all the support i can get and am grateful for your opinion, i think it's a good idea to get another ultrasound just have to go to another GP mine doesn't want to run any more tests. i did book an app with the surgeon which is just general surgeon (apparently it's very hard to find breast surgeon around here) so hopefully it's just me freaking out for nothing and it's all in my head like my doctor says.
35 year old dx march 2013 with proctitis, later with colitis with inflammation in the cecum and right colon
tried solofalk oral and suppositories,slippery elm, l-glutamine, tumeric, florastor, VSL3
currently doing FMt, no other medications or supplements are taken except vit E suppositories. gluten, grain and sugar free diet
Posts.Title: having strange symptoms and need advice

Posts.Content: hello everyone, i am 35 years old and for the past 2 years been having pain, tenderness and itching in the left breast, done ultrasound 2 years ago and mammogram December last year everything was clear, but the itching driving me mad it's inside the nipple and even slightest touch is irritating, lifting my arm is annoying too it's like i have big pimple inside the breast, sometimes it burns underarm as well. i don't feel any lumps or bumps but maybe i am doing it wrong. went to the doctor last week and she sent me to the surgeon(cause she doesn't know what else to do), who's booked out for the next 2 months. so i am not sure what to do? go to another gp and ask for ultrasound again or just wait? i'd appreciate any advice or any idea that will help me to understand what's wrong and fix it. thank you
Posts.Title: having strange symptoms and need advice
